title: Installed packages do not become available in spack environment until deactivate + activate

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
When I install a package within a spack env, this package does not become available until I deactivate the environment, and then activate it again.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ which python
$ spack env create myenv
$ spack env activate myenv
$ spack install python@3.8.2
$ which python
$ spack env deactivate
$ spack env activate myenv
$ which python
```

### Error Message

which python command inside the spack env should point to the spack installed python (python@3.8.2 in this case), but it points to the system python (/usr/bin/python).

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1172-46ab939
* **Python:** 3.4.3
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu14.04-ivybridge
